definition: (to go to) distant parts/faraway/a distant relative
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: Later that morning, Werther informed the servant that he would be going on a trip.
sentences.chinese: 那個上午晚些時候，維特告訴僕人說他要出遠門。

sentences.english: Helen is anxious about travelling on her own.
sentences.chinese: 海倫對自己一個人出遠門旅行感到擔心。

sentences.english: Octogene Chen is Taiwan's farmers, has never been too far out the door.
sentences.chinese: 陳阿土是臺灣的農民，從來沒有出過遠門。

sentences.english: One day, their father Mr Earnshaw came back from a long journey.
sentences.chinese: 一天，他們的父親歐肖先生出遠門回來。

sentences.english: They ran it when he was away, for example.
sentences.chinese: 比如，丈夫出遠門時，妻子照料家庭。

sentences.english: They might not plan big trips or try something risky.
sentences.chinese: 他們可能都不會出遠門，或是試圖做有風險的事。

sentences.english: Internet penetration is rising in developing countries and emerging markets. online retailers allow consumers to shop without taking a trip.
sentences.chinese: 在線零售商允許消費者不用出遠門就可以購物。

sentences.english: I want to accompany her a short distance.
sentences.chinese: 她頭一次出遠門，我想伴送一程。

sentences.english: Or maybe you're going to go away and you want a neighbour to water your plants.
sentences.chinese: 或者，你因爲要出遠門而需要鄰居給你養的植物澆水。

sentences.english: One day he went on a long trip alone.
sentences.chinese: 一天，他要獨自出趟遠門。

sentences.english: I get the house all shipshape while he is away.
sentences.chinese: 他出遠門時，我把房子收拾得整整齊齊。

sentences.english: The first time Xiao Ming left home alone, his mother was very worried.
sentences.chinese: 第一次獨自出遠門，媽媽還真有些難以放懷。

sentences.english: The Chongqing citizens don't have to trip far away for their luxurious home then.
sentences.chinese: 重慶市民終於可以不用再出遠門去買奢侈家居了。

sentences.english: He abandoned his desolate home and set out on a long journey.
sentences.chinese: 他拋棄了荒蕪的家園，出遠門去了。
